nodes.text: Skine Bounty Hunter College was a member house of the Bounty Hunters' Guild. It employed specialists who were considered to be at the top of their trade in a variety of fields.

Imperial Governor Wilek Nereus once sent sixteen stormtroopers to the college to receive special training as his "elite" guard, which he called the "Protectorate". Other alumni of the college included Zeed Venom and the Reenogga Sisters; Adri, Vella and Kara.
